Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your business operations significantly. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $12000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $15000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you're interested. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
